External Credit Risk Score: The score provided by external credit bureaus reflecting the creditworthiness of an individual.
Months Since Oldest Credit Line: The number of months since the individual's oldest credit line was opened.
Months Since Latest Credit Line Opened: The time elapsed since the most recent credit line was initiated.
Average Age of Credit Lines (Months): The average number of months that all the individual's credit lines have been open.
Number of Satisfactory Credit Lines: The count of credit lines where payments have been made on time and are in good standing.
Credit Lines with 60+ Days Late Payment: The number of credit lines that have payments late by 60 days or more, or that have negative public records.
Credit Lines with 90+ Days Late Payment: The number of credit lines that have payments late by 90 days or more, or that have negative public records.
Percentage of Credit Lines Never Delinqu: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that have never been delinquent.
Months Since Most Recent Delinquency: The number of months since the individual's last delinquent payment.
Worst Delinquency Status in Last 12 Mont: The most severe delinquency status recorded in the last 12 months.
Worst Delinquency Status Ever: The most severe delinquency status the individual has ever had.
Total Number of Credit Lines: The total count of all credit lines the individual has.
Number of Credit Lines Opened in Last 12: The count of new credit lines opened within the last 12 months.
Percentage of Installment-Based Credit L: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that are installment-based (e.g., loans with fixed payment amounts).
Months Since Most Recent Credit Inquiry: The number of months since the last credit inquiry, excluding the past week.
Number of Credit Inquiries in Last 6 Mon: The count of inquiries made into the individual's credit report in the past six months.
The count of inquiries made into the individual's credit report in the past six months, excluding the last 7 days.
Used Fraction of Revolving Credit Lines: The proportion of revolving credit that is currently being used by the individual.
Used Fraction of Installment Credit Line: The proportion of installment credit that is currently being used by the individual.
Number of Revolving Credit Lines with Ou: The count of revolving credit lines that have an outstanding balance.
Number of Installment Credit Lines with: The count of installment credit lines that have an outstanding balance.
Bank/National Credit Lines with High Uti: The count of bank or national credit lines where a high proportion of the credit line is used.
Percentage of Credit Lines with Outstand: The percentage of the individual's credit lines that have an outstanding balance.
